content.html: After 5 years of work, security.txt is officially an RFC. I am pleased to announce RFC 9116: rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc9116. I would like to use this opportunity to thank those who made this possible. Thank you. ❤️
content.value:
After 5 years of work, security.txt is officially an RFC. I am pleased to announce RFC 9116: rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc9116.

I would like to use this opportunity to thank those who made this possible. Thank you. ❤️

photo.alt: The security.txt specification has been published as RFC 9116
